vote.title: Authorize a decrease in the construction services Contract No. CCT-2020-00013016 with Sawyers Construction, Inc., for Change Order No. 2 reducing the contractor’s scope of work for the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center Dallas Elevator and Escalator Modernization project located at 650 South Griffin Street - Not to exceed ($408,655.02) from $6,503,498.00 to $6,094,842.98 - Financing Convention Center Construction Fund
